body:
If it is, we are on borrowed time at 10003 subscribers. Odds are likely that he wasn’t being truthful at 10000 being the death of T_C. We will hopefully live to see another day.

But just because it’s not 10000 subs that’s the end, doesn’t mean that the end isn’t near, because it probably is, so be prepared, specifically for the content policy update.
body_html:

title: The_Cabal just hit 10000 subscribers, is N8 telling the truth?
